name: URLSessionDownloadDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines methods that URL session instances call on their delegates to handle task-level events specific to download tasks.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, downloadTask: URLSessionDownloadTask, didFinishDownloadingTo: URL)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a download task has finished downloading.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, downloadTask: URLSessionDownloadTask, didResumeAtOffset: Int64, expectedTotalBytes: Int64)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the download task has resumed downloading.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, downloadTask: URLSessionDownloadTask, didWriteData: Int64, totalBytesWritten: Int64, totalBytesExpectedToWrite: Int64)
items.desc: Periodically informs the delegate about the downloadâ€™s progress.
